item.title: Doom ports
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

justinvr@justinpc:~$ sudo apt-cache search doom justinvr@justinpc:~$ sudo apt-cache search doomlegacy justinvr@justinpc:~$ sudo apt-cache search legacy docbook-xml - standard XML documentation system, for software and systems flex-old - The old version of the fast lexical analyzer generator. imake - C preprocessor-based Makefile build system inputattach - utility to attach serial devices to the input subsystem libxaw6 - X11 Athena Widget library libxaw6-dbg - X11 Athena Widget library (debug package) libxaw7 - X11 Athena Widget library libxaw7-dbg - X11 Athena Widget library (debug package) libxaw7-dev - X11 Athena Widget library (development headers) libxpm-dev - X11 pixmap library (development headers) libxpm4 - X11 pixmap library libxpm4-dbg - X11 pixmap library (debug package) xbitmaps - Base X bitmaps xserver-xorg-driver-s3 - X.Org X server -- legacy S3 display driver zenity - Display graphical dialog boxes from shell scripts openoffice.org-filter-so52 - StarOffice 5.2 format filters for OpenOffice.org nvidia-glx - NVIDIA binary XFree86 4.x/X.Org driver nvidia-glx-legacy - NVIDIA binary XFree86 4.x/X.Org 'legacy' driver nvidia-glx-legacy-dev - NVIDIA binary XFree86 4.x/X.Org 'legacy' driver development files justinvr@justinpc:~$
:(?

Read full topic
